thread.title: HBO Now: Here's what's coming and going in March
thread.title_full: HBO Now: Here's what's coming and going in March

author: Rachel Desantis
title: HBO Now: Here's what's coming and going in March
text:
Email Chuck Zlotnick/Universal Pictures/courtesy Everett Collection; Alan Markfield/TM/ Fox /courtesy Everett Collection 
The weather may finally be starting to heat up, but that doesn’t mean you have to pry yourself away from a movie binge and venture outside just yet. 
In fact, with the new slate of movies and TV shows hitting HBO Now in March, you may have enough new material to hold you over for the rest of spring. 
If sequels and reboots are your thing, be sure to catch X-Men: Apocalypse , Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising , Ice Age: Collision Course , and Independence Day: Resurgence . Or maybe you’d prefer to cry your eyes out to Marley & Me for the umpteenth time. 
Jerrod Carmichael’s comedy special, 8 , and UConn: The March to Madness , an unscripted HBO Sports series, are also arriving. 
RELATED: Hear more of the latest TV news from this week 
See below for the full list of what’s coming to HBO Now, as well as the movies you’ll have one last chance to catch before they leave. 
Available March 1 American Psycho II: All American Girl, 2003 Bullet to the Head, 2013 The Cider House Rules, 1999 Closed Circuit, 2013
